title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince  **SPOILER ALERT**
content:
SPOILER ALERT! Don't read unless you've read the book!

I got done with it this morning, I thought it wasn't as good as PoA or OotF, but it was still very good.

On a note towards plot, it did much for the story. However, I knew before I read it that Dumbledore was going to die. I figured he would when Sirius died. Harry is going to have to beat Voldemort on his own, without aid.

The Horcruxes are an interesting part of the story, and they do shed some light on ideas in CoS, like Rowling said HBP would.

I actually didn't think Snape was the HBP, or that he would be the one to kill Dumbledore (I figured Voldemort would get that task). It was a real shocker when he proclaimed himself to be, but I knew, again, that Snape would turn evil at the end (there's never a Dark Arts teacher for more than a year, and losing him wouldn't of been a real loss)

Which brings me to the final thing to comment on, and that is: R.A.B.

In all my vast knowledge (Read all books 13 times each, cept for HBP, and no, I was not at the costume party... I'm not that much of nerd, well, I am, but not in that way...) of Harry Potter, I know of only ONE possible character who would have the initials "R.A.B." and I say possible because we never hear his middle name.

Regulus "A." Black

I know, very unlikely, but sadly he does fit most of the characteristics, right age for note, possible right initials, he knew the Dark Lord, and he is dead.

But I dunno, it's only a thought..~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...
